name: Pig Skillet
desc: 3 scrambled eggs, ham, bacon, sausage, green peppers, onion, mushrooms, homemade sausage gravy and cheddar cheese.  Served over homestyle potatoes.

name: Veggie Skillet
desc: 3 scrambled eggs, green pepper, mushroom, tomato, spinach, served over homestyle potatoes smothered in cheddar cheese.
